_sText:
I guess you know where to add the map, but just to be sure: Local Disk C > Programfiles > Steam/valve > steamapps > [Account Name] > Counter-Strike Source. Just add the folder here, and select "yes to all".
This map has quite a few secrets, and I'm sure you won't find them all :P I recommend using a flahlight since the maps is really dark at some parts...


Have fun!
